official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to grant to the widow or widower of a Federal employee or annuitant whose health insurance coverage would otherwise terminate because of such employee's or annuitant's death the right to elect the same temporary extension of coverage as is available to certain former spouses.

summary.text: Grants the widow or widower of a Federal employee or annuitant whose health insurance coverage would otherwise terminate because of such employee's or annuitant's death the right to elect the same temporary extension of coverage as is available to certain former spouses.

titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to grant to the widow or widower of a Federal employee or annuitant whose health insurance coverage would otherwise terminate because of such employee's or annuitant's death the right to elect the same temporary extension of coverage as is available to certain former spouses.
